StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateNROTCCandidate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NROTCCandidateID int = 0, @NWAID int, @ContractID int = NULL, @CollegeAcceptanceLeter char(1), @MedicalDisposi.on int, @Consulta.onType varchar(2) = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NROTC_CANDIDATE WHERE NROTC_CANDIDATE_ID = @NROTCCandidateID) BEGIN UPDATE NROTC_CANDIDATE SET COLLEGE_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER = @CollegeAcceptanceLeter, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION = @MedicalDisposi.on, CONSULTATION_TYPE = @Consulta.onType, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NROTC_CANDIDATE_ID = @NROTCCandidateID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO NROTC_CANDIDATE (NWA_ID, CONTRACT_ID, COLLEGE_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER, MEDICAL_DISPOSITION, CONSULTATION_TYPE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWAID, @ContractID, @CollegeAcceptanceLeter, @MedicalDisposi.on, @Consulta.onType, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
